name: Offroad Rift - Free Muscle Car Racing For Kids
name_original: Offroad Rift - Free Muscle Car Racing For Kids
description:
Have you ever wanted to be the fastest muscle car racer? WELL NOW YOU CAN CONQUER THE OFFROAD WITH HIGH DRIFT IN MUSCLE CAR RACING SKILLS..!!

Game Modes:
*** Time Trial
*** Knock out Race
*** One on One Race
*** Nitro Boost Pick
*** xtreme Checkpoint Chase
*** Obstacle Jump Stunts
*** Offroad Rally Mode

In Offroad Rift, pick your wanted Muscle Car and join the extreme racing challenge. Race head to head with opponents cars to become a racing champion. Muscle racing car’s gear is in full throttle and the foot is on the pedal, all you have to do is take control and drive your real Muscle Cars on some of the fastest offroad racing tracks.
